name: Maele 'Neko
title: Chief Technology Officer & Managing Director
summary: IT professional with 14+ years’ experience in software, DevOps, UI/UX design, networking, and data analytics; delivering innovative solutions that drive growth and eﬃciency.

experience.role: Senior Software Engineer, CTO & Managing Director
highlights: I build responsive and user-friendly web interfaces using HTML and CSS, while leveraging modern frameworks such as React, Tailwind CSS, and Vue.js to create dynamic, scalable, and visually engaging applications. My focus is on delivering seamless user experiences across devices, ensuring that websites and applications are both performant and accessible. In addition to clean, maintainable code, I emphasize best practices in design systems, component reusability, and cross-browser compatibility, allowing projects to grow eﬃciently while maintaining a polished look and feel. I develop scalable and eﬃcient backend applications and APIs using Node.js, Python (Flask, Django), and PHP. My work emphasizes secure data handling, optimized performance, and reliable integration with front-end systems, ensuring smooth communication across platforms. I also design database structures, manage server-side logic, and implement best practices that support maintainability and future growth of applications.

I design and optimize SQL and NoSQL databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, MongoDB), ensuring eﬃcient schemas, queries, and data integrity. I implement robust security and backup measures, monitor performance, and ﬁne-tune systems for reliability, scalability, and maintainability.
I integrate third-party APIs, manage code with Git, and deploy via CI/CD on AWS, Azure, Render, Netlify, Vercel or Heroku.
I integrate APIs and implement AI solutions, including FastAPI, NLP, recommendation engines, and predictive analytics, for intelligent, data-driven experiences.

As Chief Technology Oﬃcer and Managing Director, I am responsible for deﬁning and executing the company’s overall strategic direction while leading its technological vision and innovation agenda. I oversee the development and deployment of secure, scalable, and future-focused IT solutions that strengthen our competitive position and deliver value to clients. In parallel, I provide executive leadership across all business functions, driving growth, forging strategic partnerships, and ensuring operational excellence. By integrating technology leadership with corporate governance, I ensure the company remains agile, sustainable, and aligned with its long-term objectives.

experience.role: Web developer, Graphic Designer & Chief Operating Oﬃcer
highlights: I develop and maintain responsive web applications with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and frameworks like Bootstrap and Vue.js, integrating APIs, optimizing performance and SEO, enforcing security best practices, managing code via Git/GitLab, and staying current with emerging web technologies.

I conceptualize, produce and supervise all UI/UX work for clients; these include (but are not limited to) website mock-ups, product wire-frames, digital products prototypes. I also create web and print media graphics for clients as per speciﬁcations.

I oversee the daily operations that keep the business running smoothly, from managing project delivery and client support to ensuring our infrastructure and systems are reliable and secure. I work closely with my colleagues to streamline workﬂows, allocate resources effectively, and implement strategies that align with our long-term goals. My role also involves monitoring performance metrics, driving operational eﬃciency, and making sure our teams deliver high-quality solutions on time and within budget, all while adapting quickly to the fast-changing technology landscape.

Collaborated with editors and journalists to align visuals with content.
Designed newspaper website.

Veriﬁed facts, statistics, and sources.
Wrote engaging headlines, captions, and subheadings.
Collaborated with journalists and photographers to reﬁne content.
Formatted articles for print and digital editions, including charts and images.
Ensured legal, ethical, and copyright compliance.
Maintained style guides and agriculture-speciﬁc terminology.
Assisted in content planning, special features, and thematic issues.
Monitored reader feedback and ensured timely, relevant coverage.
